posts.name: Crab Deck
posts.note: Full service, waterfront dining, inside and outside on the Kent Narrows with lunch, dinner, happy hour, kids menu, and steamed crabs.

posts.name: Family Meal restaurant - Frederick, MD
posts.note: Modern, all-day diner from 'Top Chef' runner-up Bryan Voltaggio, set in a former car dealership.

posts.name: Storm Brothers Ice Cream Factory - Annapolis, MD
posts.note: Neighborhood ice cream parlor serving cones, shakes, flurries, sundaes and more since 1976.

posts.name: Tastee Diner - Bethesda, MD
posts.note: Longtime old-school diner serving homestyle American comfort-food classics 24 hours, 7 days a week.

posts.name: Zoe's Chocolate Co.
posts.note: Zoe’s Chocolate combines the tradition of past generations and of true artisan chocolatiers, with the modern sophistication of today’s flavors, trends and ingredients. You need to buy yourself a roasted almond and dark chocolate bar.
